task.title: Combine and Extract Arrays
task.problemStatement: Write functions to combine multiple arrays together and extract specific portions from arrays using various methods.
task.expectedOutput: Combined arrays and extracted array portions

challenges.title: Combine Multiple Arrays
challenges.description: Create a function that combines 3 or more arrays into a single array. Use both concat() and spread operator methods.

challenges.title: Extract Portion of Array
challenges.description: Write a function that extracts a portion of an array between two indices without modifying the original array.

challenges.title: Merge and Remove Duplicates
challenges.description: Combine multiple arrays and remove duplicate elements. Return a new array with unique values only.

task.title: Master Spread Operator
task.problemStatement: Learn and apply the spread operator (...) to arrays and objects for copying, combining, and destructuring.
task.expectedOutput: Properly spread arrays and objects with correct syntax

challenges.title: Spread Array Elements
challenges.description: Use spread operator to convert an array into individual elements. Pass array elements as separate arguments to a function.

challenges.title: Shallow Copy Arrays
challenges.description: Create a shallow copy of an array using the spread operator. Verify that modifying the copy doesn't affect the original.

challenges.title: Combine with Filtering
challenges.description: Use spread operator to combine arrays and apply filtering conditions in a single operation.

task.title: Iterate Through Arrays
task.problemStatement: Explore different methods to iterate through arrays including forEach, for loop, while loop, and for...of.
task.expectedOutput: Successfully iterate and process all array elements

challenges.title: ForEach with Index
challenges.description: Use forEach() to iterate through an array and log both the element and its index.

challenges.title: Conditional Iteration
challenges.description: Iterate through an array and perform different actions based on element values. Skip elements that don't meet criteria.

challenges.title: Nested Array Iteration
challenges.description: Iterate through a multi-dimensional array and flatten it into a single array using nested loops.

task.title: Convert Between Arrays and Strings
task.problemStatement: Learn how to join arrays into strings and split strings into arrays using appropriate methods.

challenges.title: Join Array with Separator
challenges.description: Convert an array of words into a sentence using join() method with specific separators.

challenges.title: Split and Process String
challenges.description: Split a string by delimiter and process each element to create a formatted output.

challenges.title: CSV Data Processing
challenges.description: Parse CSV data by splitting on commas, process rows, and join them back in different format.

task.title: Sort Arrays in Different Ways
task.problemStatement: Learn to sort arrays of numbers, strings, and objects using the sort() method with custom comparators.
task.expectedOutput: Arrays sorted in ascending, descending, or custom order

challenges.title: Sort Numbers Ascending
challenges.description: Sort an array of numbers in ascending order using a comparison function.

challenges.title: Sort Objects by Property
challenges.description: Sort an array of objects by a specific property (like name or age) in ascending or descending order.

challenges.title: Complex Multi-Level Sorting
challenges.description: Sort an array of objects by multiple criteria. First by one property, then by another if values are equal.

task.title: Test Array Elements
task.problemStatement: Learn to use every() and some() methods to test whether array elements meet specific conditions.
task.expectedOutput: Boolean results from array testing methods

challenges.title: Check All Even Numbers
challenges.description: Use every() to check if all numbers in an array are even. Return true or false.

challenges.title: Check Any Large Value
challenges.description: Use some() to check if at least one element in the array is greater than 100.

challenges.title: Complex Validation Logic
challenges.description: Create a validation function using every() and some() that tests multiple complex conditions on array elements.

task.title: Test Objects in Arrays
task.problemStatement: Apply testing methods (every, some) to arrays of objects with complex property validation.
task.expectedOutput: Boolean results from testing object properties

challenges.title: Verify All Users Active
challenges.description: Check if all user objects in an array have status set to 'active' using every() method.

challenges.title: Find Any Premium Member
challenges.description: Use some() to check if at least one member object has a premium property set to true.

challenges.title: Multi-Property Validation
challenges.description: Test objects with multiple properties and ensure all meet specific criteria across different properties.

task.title: Filter Array Elements
task.problemStatement: Use the filter() method to create new arrays containing only elements that meet specific conditions.
task.expectedOutput: New filtered arrays with selected elements

challenges.title: Filter Numbers Above Threshold
challenges.description: Filter an array of numbers and return only those greater than 50.

challenges.title: Filter Objects by Property
challenges.description: Filter an array of objects and return only items where a specific property matches a condition.

challenges.title: Chain Multiple Filters
challenges.description: Apply multiple filter conditions in sequence to progressively narrow down array elements.

task.title: Find Specific Array Elements
task.problemStatement: Learn to use find() and findIndex() methods to locate elements in arrays based on conditions.

challenges.title: Find First Even Number
challenges.description: Use find() to locate the first even number in an array of integers.

challenges.title: Find Index of Object
challenges.description: Use findIndex() to locate the index of an object with a specific property value.

challenges.title: Find with Complex Logic
challenges.description: Find elements using complex conditions involving multiple properties or calculations.

task.title: Transform Arrays with Map
task.problemStatement: Use the map() method to transform each element of an array into a new value.

challenges.title: Double All Numbers
challenges.description: Create a new array where each number is doubled using map() method.

challenges.title: Extract Object Properties
challenges.description: Use map() to extract a specific property from each object in an array.

challenges.title: Complex Object Transformation
challenges.description: Transform an array of objects into a completely different structure using map() with nested operations.

task.title: Chain Multiple Array Methods
task.problemStatement: Combine multiple array methods (map, filter, reduce) in a single chain for efficient data processing.
task.expectedOutput: Final result from chained array operations

challenges.title: Filter and Map Combined
challenges.description: Filter an array to get only numbers above 10, then double each number using method chaining.

challenges.title: Complex Data Pipeline
challenges.description: Chain filter, map, and sort methods to process an array of objects with multiple transformations.

challenges.title: Optimize with Chaining
challenges.description: Take inefficient nested loop code and refactor it using method chaining for better performance.

task.title: Aggregate Data with Reduce
task.problemStatement: Master the reduce() method to aggregate array elements into a single value or object.

challenges.title: Sum All Array Elements
challenges.description: Use reduce() to calculate the sum of all numbers in an array.

challenges.title: Build Object from Array
challenges.description: Use reduce() to convert an array of key-value pairs into a single object.

challenges.title: Complex Aggregation
challenges.description: Use reduce() with complex logic to group, count, and calculate statistics from array elements.

task.title: Compare Array Methods
task.problemStatement: Understand when to use sort(), filter(), map(), and reduce() methods for different data processing tasks.
task.expectedOutput: Correct use of each method for specific scenarios

challenges.title: Choose Right Method
challenges.description: For various data processing scenarios, identify which array method (sort/filter/map/reduce) is most appropriate.

challenges.title: Refactor Inefficient Code
challenges.description: Take poorly written data processing code and optimize it by choosing the right combination of methods.

challenges.title: Performance Comparison
challenges.description: Write solutions using different methods and compare their performance and readability.

task.title: Solve Array Interview Problems
task.problemStatement: Practice common array manipulation problems asked in technical interviews.

challenges.title: Find Missing Number
challenges.description: Given an array of n-1 integers from 1 to n, find the missing number efficiently.

challenges.title: Two Sum Problem
challenges.description: Find two numbers in an array that add up to a target sum using optimal approach.

challenges.title: Array Rotation Problem
challenges.description: Rotate an array left or right by k positions without using extra space.

task.title: Master Functions
task.problemStatement: Learn function declarations, expressions, arrow functions, parameters, return values, and scope.

challenges.title: Function Declaration vs Expression
challenges.description: Create functions using both declaration and expression syntax. Understand hoisting differences.

challenges.title: Arrow Functions and This
challenges.description: Write arrow functions and understand how 'this' binding differs from regular functions.

challenges.title: Higher Order Functions
challenges.description: Create functions that return other functions. Practice currying and function composition.
